definitions.definition: a large group of people who live together in an organized way, making decisions about how to do things and sharing the work that needs to be done. All the people in a country, or in several similar countries, can be referred to as a society:
the part of society that consists of people who are rich, powerful, and fashionable:
the state of being together with other people:
examples: She prefers her own society (= likes to be alone).
